satelliteInfo: Our website is dedicated to the processing and analysis of satellite data.
subtitleB4G: Smarter care for parks, trees, and water bodies, powered by satellites.
paragraph1B4G: Blue4Green blends Earth Observation with your local data to monitor heat, water quality, shade, irrigation needs, and vegetation health.
paragraph2B4G: Our simple dashboard and alerts help city teams act sooner, meet EU Nature Restoration Law goals, and show real impact.
heatAnalysis: Heat Analysis: Citywide maps of land-surface temperature with modelled air temperature, heat-stress risk, UV guidance, and historical trends to track progress and target cooling actions.
waterQuality: Water Quality: Satellite-driven indicators for chlorophyll-a, blue-green algal bloom risk, turbidity, Secchi disk depth, and surface temperature, delivered as status, trends, and alerts for lakes and slow rivers.
shadeMapping: Shade Mapping: Time-of-day and seasonal shade coverage across parks, streets, and buildings to guide planting, canopies, and comfort routes.
treeIntelligence: Tree Intelligence: Individual tree detection where imagery supports it; canopy cover mapping from satellites city-wide.
irrigation: Irrigation: Zone-level recommendations (â‰ˆ3 m pixels) that combine vegetation stress via evapotranspiration, weather, and local context to keep green assets healthy.
resilience: Resilience: Vegetation vitality and drought-pressure indices to flag at-risk areas and monitor recovery.
euNatureLaw: EU Nature Restoration Law: Consistent change detection, green-area accounting, biodiversity management, and exportable indicators to support reporting and compliance.
